name: Charles ONLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Philadelphia County Post Conviction Relief Act (PCRA) Unit, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Onley v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Charles ONLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Philadelphia County Post Conviction Relief Act (PCRA) Unit, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of October, 2011, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation improper). The Prothonotary is directed to forward the filings to counsel of record.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
31 A.3d 284
Charles ONLEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Philadelphia County Post Conviction Relief Act (PCRA) Unit, Respondent.
No. 42 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 3, 2011.
